Baseline.name: baseline
Baseline.selection: MET>=250 and MT>=150 and Njets>=2 and DPhi_jmet>=0.8 and trigger and tmod>-1000 and Mlb>=0

Region.name: SR1l
Region.selection: Nbjets>=1 and NLeps==1 and NVLeps==1 and TrackVeto and TauVeto and ( (lep1_MediumID and abs(lep1_pdgid)==11) or (lep1_TightID and abs(lep1_pdgid)==13) )

Bin.name: _B_
Bin.label: _B_
Bin.selection: Njets!>=3 and tmod>=10 and Mlb>175 and NTightbjets>=1

Bin.name: _D_
Bin.label: _D_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod!>=0 and Mlb>175 and NTightbjets>=1

Bin.name: _E_
Bin.label: _E_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>0 and tmod!>=10 and Mlb!>=175

Bin.name: _F_
Bin.label: _F_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>0 and tmod!>=10 and Mlb>175 and NTightbjets>=1

Bin.name: _H_
Bin.label: _H_
Bin.selection: Njets>=4 and tmod>=10 and Mlb>175 and NTightbjets>=1

Bin.name: _I_
Bin.label: _I_
Bin.selection: Njets>=5 and lep1_pt!>150 and dphiML!>2 and passMEDbtag->at(0) == false
